remarks: First-order logic and set theory.  (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 22-Dec-2016.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
bnj1366.1 $e |- ( ps <-> ( A e. _V /\ A. x e. A E! y ph /\ B = { y | E. x e. A ph } ) ) $.
bnj1366 $p |- ( ps -> B e. _V ) $.
$d A x y $.
